casebody.data:
Ross ABBOTT, et al., petitioners,
v.
Harris PASTIDES, et al. No. 18-704. Supreme Court of the United States March 4, 2019.

Motion of First Amendment Clinics at Duke Law, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of The South Carolina ACLU, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
